properties.name: Obligatory pronouns in subject position
properties.description: Pronominal subjects are expressed by pronouns in subject position that are normally if not obligatorily present

properties.name: Subject affixes on verb
properties.description: Pronominal subjects are expressed by affixes on verbs

properties.name: Subject clitics on variable host
properties.description: Pronominal subjects are expressed by clitics with variable host

properties.name: Subject pronouns in different position
properties.description: Pronominal subjects are expressed by subject pronouns that occur in a different syntactic position from full noun phrase subjects

properties.name: Optional pronouns in subject position
properties.description: Pronominal subjects are expressed only by pronouns in subject position, but these pronouns are often left out

properties.name: Mixed
properties.description: More than one of the above types with none dominant
